500.description: There was a problem while using the store

parameters.name: configUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the config that created the results.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp of the results to be downloaded.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New Schedule Report to be created

400.description:
Invalid report type.
Empty list of email addresses.
Invalid report type.
Read-only field uuid specified

409.description:
Email server not configured on this appliance.
Maximum number of scheduled reports already configured

get.summary: Retrieve a Scheduled Report with the given uuid

parameters.name: config-id
parameters.description: UUID of the Scheduled Report to be retrieved

404.description: No scheduled report found for the uuid provided

parameters.name: config-id
parameters.description: UUID of the Scheduled Report to be updated

400.description:
Empty/Invalid schedule report name provided.
Empty list for reportTypes provided.
Read-only field uuid specified

404.description: No scheduled report found for the uuid provided

delete.summary: Delete a Scheduled Report with the given uuid

parameters.name: config-id
parameters.description: UUID of the Scheduled Report to be deleted

404.description: No scheduled report found for the uuid provided

enabled.description: This is a localise text for report type

applianceReportType.description: Report to be sent as part of this schedule. Only valid if target type is Appliances.

applianceReportTypeString.description: This is a localise text for report type. Only valid if target type is Appliances

deviceReportType.description: Report to be sent as part of this schedule. Only valid if target type is Devices.

deviceReportTypeString.description: This is a localise text for report type. Only valid if target type is Devices.

timePeriod.description: Time Period for which the report would be generated

timePeriodString.description: Time Period for which the report would be generated.

scheduleFrequency.description: It is the frequency of the schedule.

scheduleFrequencyString.description: This is a localise text for schedule frequency

frequency.description: Quartz cron expression used to create this schedule.

targetType.description: Target of this report either Appliances or Devices

targetTypeString.description: This is a localise text for report target

targetAppliances.description: Appliances for which the report is to be generated. Only applicable if targetType is APPLIANCES_TARGET

targetDevices.description: Device for which the report is to be generated. Only applicable if targetType is DEVICES_TARGET

nextPageUri.description: Provided if more members are available

total.description: Total number of members that are available
